work.title: E-Commerce Front-End Engineer
work.description: I work with our UX team to build performant, accessible UI, as well as develop solutions to novel front-end challenges. I also audit and implement an array of front-end development tools and techniques to improve our front-end performance.
highlights: Retooled our front-end workflow to support modern JavaScript.
Heavily contributed to building a brand-new single-page check out experience using React and a Java backend
Built React support into our Java development environment, marrying Spring and Create React App
Updated our CSS workflow with a Sass-based, utility-first approach
I facilitate our JavaScript Special Interest Group, a group of developers that help dictate best practices for JS at The Container Store
I also am a vocal champion for accessibility at The Container Store

work.name: The Container Store
work.description: I worked with a small group of talented developers to create the next generation of customer-facing design tools, using React to create both browser and Electron-based applications for desktop and mobile environments.
highlights: Developed a custom drag-and-drop solution to support both touchscreen and mouse interaction
Reworked the Redux implementation on one tool, which led to a conservative 50% increase in performance

work.name: The Container Store
work.summary: I collaborated with team members on our Java-based e-commerce application and supporting systems, mostly assisting with implement front-end behavior with JavaScript and styling UI with CSS.
highlights: Paired with team members to rework the site's mobile navigation
Worked on the redesign of our popular Elfa shelving system marketing pages
Participated in our monthly Hackathon challenge and was on three consecutive winning teams

work.name: INPROV, Ltd.
work.summary: For over a decade, I helped build the brands of non-profit organizations, producing marketing materials for donor development, including book design, video packaging, and brochure websites.
highlights: Worked with organizations to produce promotional materials with tight budgets and deadlines to create opportunities for high return on investment
Created new and interesting ways to present the same message in a recurring format
Built the company website from scratch after a rebrand
Developed one-off promotional web pages for clients involving custom web forms and PHP/JavaScript development
